de.dfki.lt.mary.unitselection.voiceimport
Class TimelineWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.lt.mary.unitselection.voiceimport.TimelineIO
      de.dfki.lt.mary.unitselection.voiceimport.TimelineWriter

public class TimelineWriter
extends TimelineIO

The TimelineWriter class provides an interface to create or update a Timeline data file in Mary format, and to feed new datagrams to the timeline file.

Author:
sacha

                      java.lang.String procHdrString,
                      int reqSampleRate,
                      double setIdxInterval)
Constructor to create a timeline.

Parameters:
fileName - The file to read the timeline from.
procHdrString - the string to use as a processing header.
reqSampleRate - the sample rate requested to measure time in this timeline.
